short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension sends the current tabs URL to HipChat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clicking the extention button will send the current URL to the WDI hipchat room. 

For meet ups at meetups.com, the extention adds a button to the title that will send the meet up information to the WDI hipchat room.
